title: Character Design With Aaron Blaise
description:
In this huge 16+ Hour video course,  animator, director and character design artist Aaron Blaise (â€œThe Lion Kingâ€, â€œAladdinâ€, â€œMulanâ€, â€œBeauty & The Beastâ€) takes you his process for creating compelling human and animal characters.  Watch as Aaron creates new original images right in front of you and explains his development process. You'll get Over 20 HD Tutorial Videos covering:

    Character Design Approach
    What to do â€œBefore You Drawâ€
